Name: Student Solutions Manual to Accompany Physics

ReviewList.Text: This manual is lousy, it seems to have every other odd question's answer, these answers are to the questions one isn't assigned or to questions that aren't that hard. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone.

This solutions manual is a terrible companion to the book. It offers good explanations but only for a few of the problems each chapter. It's a big book because of the ridiculous font size and spacing. Students beware.
Not a solutions manual!  Only a handful of solutions per chapter.  For example Chapter 1 in the Textbook has 69 problems and the solutions manual only has 16 of them. NOT WORTH THE MONEY!

This solutions manual doesn't have enough problems listed. With that being said it is a toss-up if you should buy. I had mine and didn't use it but once in a while. I believe that a solution manual should have 50% of the problems. This book had about 25% of the problems. Example- Chapter One problems: 3, 7, 11, 13, 21, 23, 25, 31, 35, 39, 43, 45, 53, 59, 63, 65 (16/69) = 23%. This is a tough subject, so it may benifit some to buy.

I waste my money on this manual. the book has couple solutions that was selected by who ever made it. I didnt get any benefit of this maual solution til now. I dont recommend it at all. I bought it for my Pysics 1211 or II for my summer classes we have finished 6 chapters 6 - 7 weeks so far, the Professor asign HW about 10 - 20 questions for a chapter all what i got from the manual solution is only one question. DONT GO FOR IT...

One out every fourth odd questions answered.  The book is a two volume book  and the solution manual encompasis both volumes, so I have all the solutions from volume one that I do not need.  It is a terrible book.
very good reference companion for the text itself.

I thought this was going to be only the solutions for the problems marked with ssm in the book but it has the solutions for all of the problems at the end of the chapters.  Excellent value if you don't mind not having a hard copy (although you could always print it and bind it yourself).
When I ordered my Physics book for this year, I received it in a few days even though expected delivery would be at least a week out. I had fast service and receive exactly what I ordered.
i should've received the item 2 weeks ago, i'm still waiting for it.... Poor costumer service. WHERE IS MY ITEM?
